name: Maniacs (JuricaGames)
description:
Do you have what it takes to survive the Maniacs?

Maniacs is a first person horror game. As the player you have to find weapons and items to wipe out the Maniacs and kill their leader called The General.

It's my first project as a solo game dev. I've created this game by following the Udemy course by Pete Jepson and tried to add a few little extra features in the process.

While there are still quite a few things not as polished as I'd like them to be, I'm quite happy with the final result, hence the reason for this upload.

Any feedback is very welcome and if you would like to donate you are more and welcome to do so.

Have fun with the game!
